reporting-org.narrative: New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade

description.narrative: A 5-year activity contributing to improved safety and security across Bougainville by improving the capabilities and practice of the Bougainville Police Service (BPS). Deployed NZ Police advisors train and mentor Bougainville counterparts to build a strong, well-managed, professionally led, integrated and community focused police service, with adequate resources, capacity and willingness to respond to community safety and security by working closely with Community Auxiliary Police.
